properties.NAME: Mount Magazine
properties.DESCRIPTION: Signal Hill is the tallest point in Arkansas.  Height: 2,753 ft

properties.NAME: Rich Mountain
properties.DESCRIPTION: Rich Mountain is close to Queen Wilhelmina State Park and the 225-mile Ouachita Trail.  Height: 2,681 ft

properties.NAME: Poteau Mountain
properties.DESCRIPTION: Hunting ground for the Osage and later the home of Quapaw and Caddoan tribes. Height: 2,661 ft

properties.NAME: Black Fork Mountain
properties.DESCRIPTION: At 2,661 feet, the trail offers spectacular views of the Ouachita National Forest.
